headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.leafy.studio; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.leafy.studio; img-src * data: blob:; font-src https://www.leafy.studio data:; connect-src https://www.leafy.studio https://api.leafy.studio https://*.leafy.studio; frame-src https://www.leafy.studio https://*.leafy.studio; worker-src 'self' blob:; base-uri 'none'; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests
